insert into ttz_orders (id, user_id, pid_id, create_time, update_time, amount, price, commission_percent, order_status, order_hash, order_sn, add_time, goods_id, origin, income_ratio, divide_ratio, pay_amount, effects_prediction, checkout_amount, income_prediction, checkout_time, commission_ratio, commission_amount, category, site_id, adzone_id, goods_name, shopman_wangwang, store_name, subsidy_ratio, subsidy_amount, pid,ttz_goods_id) VALUES
(#{item.id},#{item.userId},#{item.pidId}, #{item.createTime},#{item.updateTime},#{item.amount}, #{item.price},#{item.commissionPercent},#{item.orderStatus}, #{item.orderHash},#{item.orderSn},#{item.addTime}, #{item.goodsId},#{item.origin},#{item.incomeRatio}, #{item.divideRatio},#{item.payAmount},#{item.effectsPrediction}, #{item.checkoutAmount},#{item.incomePrediction},#{item.checkoutTime}, #{item.commissionRatio},#{item.commissionAmount},#{item.category}, #{item.siteId},#{item.adzoneId},#{item.goodsName}, #{item.shopmanWangwang},#{item.storeName},#{item.subsidyRatio}, #{item.subsidyAmount},#{item.pid},#{item.ttzGoodsId} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_time = VALUES(update_time),amount = VALUES(amount),price = VALUES(price), commission_percent = VALUES(commission_percent),order_status = VALUES(order_status),order_hash = VALUES(order_hash), order_sn = VALUES(order_sn),add_time = VALUES(add_time),goods_id = VALUES(goods_id), origin = VALUES(origin),income_ratio = VALUES(income_ratio),divide_ratio = VALUES(divide_ratio), pay_amount = VALUES(pay_amount),effects_prediction = VALUES(effects_prediction),checkout_amount = VALUES(checkout_amount), income_prediction = VALUES(income_prediction),checkout_time = VALUES(checkout_time),commission_ratio = VALUES(commission_ratio), commission_amount = VALUES(commission_amount),category = VALUES(category),site_id = VALUES(site_id), adzone_id = VALUES(adzone_id),goods_name = VALUES(goods_name),shopman_wangwang = VALUES(shopman_wangwang), store_name = VALUES(store_name),subsidy_ratio = VALUES(subsidy_ratio),subsidy_amount = VALUES(subsidy_amount), pid = VALUES(pid),ttz_goods_id = VALUES(ttz_goods_id)
mapper.select: select count(1) from ttz_orders where goods_id =#{good_id} and user_id in (select user_id from ttz_user_pid where end_time <= #{end_time} and start_time >=#{start_time})

select
from ttz_orders where ttz_goods_id =#{ttzGoodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id
select count(1) from ttz_orders where order_status in(12,3,200,24) and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from ttz_orders where ttz_goods_id in (select id from ttz_goods where start_time >= #{start_time} and end_time <=#{end_time}) and order_status = 12
select ttz_goods_id,count(1) as amount from ttz_orders where pid = -1 and ttz_goods_id in (select id from ttz_goods where start_time >= #{start_time} and end_time <=#{end_time}) group by ttz_goods_id
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
